UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution
UI.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
UI.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
UI.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

question: You toss a coin up in the air and then catch it.  Your friend standing beside you measures the time between the coin leaving your hand and the catch.A person in a nearby building is in a high speed elevator with glass walls and so they can see the coin toss as well. The elevator is going up fast.  Is the time interval recorded by this person between the coin leaving your hand longer, shorter or the same as the time interval measured by your friend?(In case you think it matters - while the elevator is fast, it is much, much, much, much, much, much, much slower than the speed of light...)
